channel.title: Create Your Own Class with "Class Slate" PSD Template!
channel.description:
## :art: Want to make your own ToL class [for fun]?
Introducing the Class Card Slate - a layered Photoshop PSD file where you can easily template up your own class for fun and to share with others!
Even the font files are inside. All the faction icons/types are in there, too! Just toggle which icon you want to show. Don't want so many abilities? Just hide the layer folder, np. All the colors we use are there - use the eyedropper to get the exact color to match.
:bulb: Share your ideas in #lore
:robot: Type `?slate` anytime in [Discord](https://discord.gg/tol) #bot-spam for a link to http://throneofli.es/slate
( Feeling de ja vu seeing this? https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-rolled-back-to-backup-1-day-lost/73707 )

item.title: Create Your Own Class with "Class Slate" PSD Template!
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
This is super cool! Why in the world would it not be added in? Nevermind, they brought back Allies and gave Alch 4 abilities after saying that wouldn’t be done so there is still hope

Would also be cool if King were to choose the class the Squire becomes.

item.title: Create Your Own Class with "Class Slate" PSD Template!
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Want to make your own ToL class [for fun]?

Introducing the Class Card Slate - a layered Photoshop PSD file where you can easily template up your own class for fun and to share with others!

Even the font files are inside. All the faction icons/types are in there, too! Just toggle which icon you want to show. Don’t want so many abilities? Just hide the layer folder, np. All the colors we use are there - use the eyedropper to get the exact color to match.

Share your ideas in #lore

Type ?slate anytime in Discord #bot-spam for a link to http://throneofli.es/slate

( Feeling de ja vu seeing this? https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-rolled-back-to-backup-1-day-lost/73707 )
